original_title: Anansi, Told by Denzel Washington with Music by UB40
overview: Two hilarious Jamaican folktales about the original story-spinner himself. Anansi the spider is teeny-teeny, but his boasts are as tall as tales get. Captivating rhythms of the West Indies bring this hip spider to life. Illustrated by Steven Guarnaccia. Ages 5 & up. Parents' Choice Gold Award; Oppenheim Toy Portfolio Gold Award.
title: Anansi, Told by Denzel Washington with Music by UB40
